=========
item_type
=========

Specifies the type of the item.

.. py:attribute:: item_type

**domain**: server

**language**: python

Description
===========

Use the type attribute to get the type of the item. It can have one of the 
following values 

* “task”, 
* “catalogs”, 
* “journals”, 
* “tables”, 
* “reports”, 
* “catalog”, 
* “journal”, 
* “table”, 
* “report”, 
* “detail”
